languages.text: "С весельем в сердце!" {n}Вскинув оружие, Торбальд высекает выстрелом сноп искр из наплечника Уралона.{/n} "Мне определенно по нраву твой стиль переговоров".
"With joy in my heart!" {n}Thorbald points his weapon, and his shot strikes sparks off Uralon's pauldron.{/n} "You are a negotiator after my own heart."
languages.original_text: "С весельем в сердце!" {n}Вскинув оружие, Торбальд высекает выстрелом сноп искр из наплечника Уралона.{/n} "Мне определенно по нраву твой стиль переговоров".

traits.locale_text: "With joy in my heart!" {n}Thorbald points his weapon, and his shot strikes sparks off Uralon's pauldron.{/n} "You are a negotiator after my own heart."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: “我很乐意！”{n}索巴德将武器指向了乌拉隆，枪弹在他的肩甲上打出了火花。{/n}“说你呢，你耍嘴皮子的功夫倒是挺厉害的。”
languages.original_text: "With joy in my heart!" {n}Thorbald points his weapon, and his shot strikes sparks off Uralon's pauldron.{/n} "You are a negotiator after my own heart."

traits.locale_text: “我很乐意！”{n}索巴德将武器指向了乌拉隆，枪弹在他的肩甲上打出了火花。{/n}“说你呢，你耍嘴皮子的功夫倒是挺厉害的。”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: « Avec grand plaisir ! » {n}Thorbald tire et des étincelles jaillissent de l'espaulier d'Uralon à l'impact.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|un négociateur|une négociatrice} comme je les aime. »
languages.original_text: "With joy in my heart!" {n}Thorbald points his weapon, and his shot strikes sparks off Uralon's pauldron.{/n} "You are a negotiator after my own heart."

traits.locale_text: « Avec grand plaisir ! » {n}Thorbald tire et des étincelles jaillissent de l'espaulier d'Uralon à l'impact.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|un négociateur|une négociatrice} comme je les aime. »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: 「よかろう！」{n}トールバルドが武器を向けると、ウラロンの肩甲に弾が当たり、火花が散る。{/n}「俺好みの交渉方法だ」
languages.original_text: "With joy in my heart!" {n}Thorbald points his weapon, and his shot strikes sparks off Uralon's pauldron.{/n} "You are a negotiator after my own heart."

traits.locale_text: 「よかろう！」{n}トールバルドが武器を向けると、ウラロンの肩甲に弾が当たり、火花が散る。{/n}「俺好みの交渉方法だ」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: «¡Con mucho gusto!». {n}Thorbald apunta su arma y el disparo hace que de la hombrera de Uralon salten chispas.{/n} «Me gusta su forma de negociar».
languages.original_text: "With joy in my heart!" {n}Thorbald points his weapon, and his shot strikes sparks off Uralon's pauldron.{/n} "You are a negotiator after my own heart."

traits.locale_text: «¡Con mucho gusto!». {n}Thorbald apunta su arma y el disparo hace que de la hombrera de Uralon salten chispas.{/n} «Me gusta su forma de negociar».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Mit Freude im Herzen!" {n}Thorbald zielt mit seiner Waffe, und sein Schuss prallt von Uralons Schulterschutz ab.{/n} "Ihr verhandelt ganz nach meinem Geschmack."
languages.original_text: "With joy in my heart!" {n}Thorbald points his weapon, and his shot strikes sparks off Uralon's pauldron.{/n} "You are a negotiator after my own heart."

traits.locale_text: "Mit Freude im Herzen!" {n}Thorbald zielt mit seiner Waffe, und sein Schuss prallt von Uralons Schulterschutz ab.{/n} "Ihr verhandelt ganz nach meinem Geschmack."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Zevkle!" {n}Thorbald, silahını doğrultup ateş ediyor. Atışları, Uralon'un omuz zırhından kıvılcımlar çıkmasına neden oluyor.{/n} "Hayalimdeki uzlaştırıcısın Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "With joy in my heart!" {n}Thorbald points his weapon, and his shot strikes sparks off Uralon's pauldron.{/n} "You are a negotiator after my own heart."
